attributes.action: change the British National Anthem from "God save the Queen" to "Reach up for the stars" in time for the 2012 Olympics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Picture the scene: Britain wins another gold.  The athlete takes to the podium.  Excited silence descends. Boom-boom-boom, boom-boom-ba-do-ba-dum...Reach up for the stars!!  The stadium explodes into clapping and singing.  The world rejoices in our winning and want us to win more.  Sign this petition now.  We still have time.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
